snippet.text: $< import re global white_spaces white_spaces = '' regex=re.compile(r'(?P<white_spaces\>\s*)(def )?(?P<method\>[_ \w]+\w)[ ]?(\((?P<params\>.*)\))?:?') regex=regex.match($GEDIT_CURRENT_LINE) if regex: dictionary=regex.groupdict() method=dictionary['method'].replace(' ','_') white_spaces=dictionary['white_spaces'] params= dictionary['params'] and dictionary['params'] or 'self' result = white_spaces + 'def ' + method + '(' + params + '):' else: result = $GEDIT_CURRENT_LINE return result > $<return white_spaces>
